message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, both Andrew and Karen are ancestors of Ruth. Andrew is an ancestor of Ruth through the chain: Andrew → Brenda → Samantha → Cynthia → Kayla → Christine → William → Eugene → Carol → Daniel → Judith → Theresa → Bobby → Christian → David → Vincent → Marie → Elijah → Ethan → Martha → Joan → Jason → Catherine → Juan → Jonathan → Charlotte → Randy → Alexis → Albert → Hannah → Patrick → Donna → Melissa → Evelyn → Raymond → Kathryn → Steven → Emily → Christopher → Lawrence → Aaron → Ann → Christina → Charles → Bruce → Billy → Kathleen → Patricia → Sara → Amanda → Denise → Cheryl → Dennis → Dylan → Grace → Matthew → Alan → Sean → Gary → Ralph → Nancy → Jennifer → Betty → Philip → Gloria → Jack → Sharon → Shirley → Katherine → Austin → Kevin → Sarah → Kenneth → Henry → Jesse → Barbara → George → Helen → Justin → Samuel → Anthony → Virginia → Natalie → Debra → Diane → Brandon → Douglas → Dorothy → Carolyn → Nathan → Doris → Isabella → Zachary → Madison → Sandra → Diana → Roy → Frank → Bryan → Rebecca → Stephen → Gabriel → Joseph → Sophia → Abigail → Anna → Lauren → Megan → Keith → Emma → Angela → Michael → Paul → Pamela → Jessica → Amber → Andrea → Thomas → Jacob → Mason → Ruth.

Karen is an ancestor of Ruth through the chain: Karen → Ryan → Olivia → Mary → James → Donald → Gregory → Jean → Nicholas → Richard → Laura → Beverly → Roger → Ashley → Joyce → Teresa → Ronald → Frances → Carl → Lisa → Edward → Gerald → Larry → Linda → Amy → Brian → Wayne → Elizabeth → Scott → Peter → Maria → Jordan → Joe → Adam → Rachel → Arthur → Susan → Willie → Margaret → Michelle → Jeffrey → Nicole → Jose → Julie → Logan → Jeremy → Heather → Timothy → Eric → Walter → Kelly → Janice → Robert → Bradley → Judy → Brittany → Marilyn → Benjamin → Tyler → Victoria → Terry → Julia → Russell → Danielle → Janet → Lori → Stephanie → Joshua → Kimberly → Harold → Jerry → Ruth.

Since both Andrew and Karen have Ruth as a common descendant, they share a common descendant.

<ANSWER>3</ANSWER>
